name: Smlilme
description:
Little prototype made for the autumn 2018 Lisp Jam.

It’s a turn-based dexterity game.

Help Gravel the little slippery slime monster find their friends’ lost cells so that they can play music together and live happily!

This game needs a gamepad with at least one joystick and one button, you move around by selecting a destination on the target disc with the joystick and validate with the button, that’s all there is to it. :)

I did bite more that I could chew for this jam, as I experimented with a lot of things. As a result the gameplay and level design are quite poor, but at least I learned a ton about OpenGL! :D

Source code repository: https://www.upyum.com/cgit.cgi/slilme/

A gamepad must be plugged in, otherwise the game will just close instantly!

Credits
  • Graphics: Reptifur
  • Music: myself, with Lizenn on the guitar and Reptifur on the bass
  • Code: myself
